metadata.title: CVE-2022-43035 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 v1.6.0-639. There is aheap-buffer-overflow in AP4_Dec3Atom::AP4_Dec3Atom at Ap4Dec3Atom.cpp,leading to a Denial of Service (DoS), as demonstrated by mp42aac.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
